text: Dahi laangi hua, i dono madagoaa nogo daumaha i lodo di hale daumaha o dono god Nisroch, dogolua dama daane i ana dama daane, go Adrammelech mo Sharezer, gu daalo a mee gii made gi nau hulumanu dauwa, gaa hula gaa llele hagammuni gi tenua go Ararat. Tuai dama daane i ana dama daane, go Esarhaddon guu pono di lohongo king aamua o dono damana.
